    • Constructor Detail

      • GenericBolt

        public GenericBolt(java.lang.String name,
                   boolean autoAck,
                   boolean autoAnchor,
                   backtype.storm.tuple.Fields declaredFields)
        Constructs a new GenericBolt instance.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the bolt (used in DEBUG logging)
        autoAck - Whether or not this bolt should automatically acknowledge received tuples.
        autoAnchor - Whether or not this bolt should automatically anchor to received tuples.
        declaredFields - The fields this bolt declares as output.
